documents.document: @bouchelolz @_L_M_C_ He's also on local radio. The daft racist.
@realDonaldTrump That's the spirit, Donny. Now wipe your arse, flush, and tell President Bannon this to his stupid face.
@momentumtrumpt1 @janhopis 'Hells Angels, Texas Chapter' avatar, 'PC World, Bracknell Branch' IRL.
@Zoella I hear you, Zoë. We need to rise up against people who spew hate about Curly Wurlys. Punch them right in their faces.
@realDonaldTrump Law-enforcing judges are the worst type of judge imo.
@TheAmitie @realDonaldTrump A lot of people are saying that he wears diapers. Maybe a health thing, maybe a sex thing. I don't know.
@Glinner Conversation ender / "that was almost good" endorsement.
@bradweslake Interesting (and encouraging). I'll read up.
@madgoat69 @Chris_arnade My concern is that it's too late. Election is won, focus now seems to be on dismantling democratic structures.
@madgoat69 @Chris_arnade I don't think you can - especially not with the safety valve of 'fake news'.

@CBSNews I'm going to make the same comment twice.
You know - like in the movie "Groundhog Day".
@Chris_arnade Pro-Trump will only become anti-Trump when it harms them personally. Same goes for Brexit.
@Chris_arnade It's impossible to reason people out of a position that they didn't reason themselves into.
@CBSNews I'm going to make the same comment twice. You know - like in the movie "Groundhog Day".

@Jay_Beecher My 6 year old told me that they sing "Ba ba black sheep / Lee Rigby was good".
Are you calling my child a liar, "Jay"?
@SebGorka Who's going to run Al's Toy Barn while you're pissing around in the White House?
@OwensDamien Used to be in The Bill. Hasn't worked since 2002. His Wikipedia page has a 'Personal Life' section spanning 4 paragraphs.
@realDonaldTrump Why do you wear diapers, Mr President? A health thing, or a sex thing?
@Nigel_Farage @realDonaldTrump Trump does things like a tsunami? You'll never get a job in politics with cruel jibes like that.
@RealAlexJones @Bro_Pair A Russel Crowe effigy made entirely out of ham.
@JumpVote Did the left steal your chin?

@paddypower Nabbed (cc @ALS_Fanzine)
Also, typo.
@TopTopPundit @2010LeeHurst We all lose, Lee. All thanks to #torture.
@TopTopPundit @2010LeeHurst Meanwhile, the real terrorists just wanted his demands met. Those demands? Get Lee Hurst back on TV.
@2010LeeHurst You killed my baby, Lee. They think it's all over, Lee. IT IS NOW, LEE.
@2010LeeHurst You torture the terrorist. He tells you where your baby is, but he's wrong because he wasn't the terrorist after all.
@realDonaldTrump Obama would've had it done by Wednesday. Lazy.
@PrisonPlanet @YouTube You sound like a hospital radio DJ who only got the gig cos he's terminal.

@bessbell @realDonaldTrump Not so - that's the encore.
"One more song, Mormon Tabernacle Choir!". Some say they're still there.
@realDonaldTrump It was 9:00 ages ago here. You need to make American 9:00 earlier. Lazy!
@DVATW Spreading the blame ahead of the inevitable collapse of Brexit, hoping that the weirdos go after the judges
@seanspicer @Bro_Pair @Target I heard it was 1.5 millions gallons of cheese.
@RichardBSpencer @realDonaldTrump Get a haircut you curtain-y soft shite.
Putin - "Control the media. Restrict the internet. Repeat. Distort. Dismantle. Only then can you lie, because now y… https://t.co/JYftkOAMt5
@BeardedGenius I keep on waiting for a dastardly master plan... then he's an idiot. Again. He'll become impeachable… https://t.co/1JVN7iZdlH
@ohhoe @directhex I'm several hundred loops in and your hypothesis holds up.
@ohhoe @directhex Come for the punch in the face, stay for his mates running away.
@xV_krampus Putin. Actual Putin though.
@xV_krampus I'm not American. Just an interested spectator, watching the death throes of a superpower. Enjoy it. I will.
@xV_krampus @CNN Yeah. The same, but from a different angle.

@FeliciaBGomez They've Obama to thank for those jobs.
What a crowd-pulling, job creating legend.
Cocaine's a hell of a drug. #Inauguration
History. #Inauguration https://t.co/0E1s93usrA

This is like watching Formula One. Incredible boring but you can't look away.
Just in case.
#Inauguration
@DVATW You should consider a combover. You've such a nice face.
@WeahsCousin 19:01 - Grief. 19:04 - Outrage about joke. 19:18 - General joke acceptance. 19:43 - Alex Jones conspiracy theory.
@boynamedshark I hope the Pope sees this, or else he might forget to obey Jesus.
@wefail "Somebody's gonna love you" sounds like dialogue from Deliverance.
Here's a piece I call "Trump on Twitter". https://t.co/7TuW8C49IN
@realDonaldTrump They've made their bed, Donald. They should lie in piss.
@realDonaldTrump No steam without piss.
@realDonaldTrump No nothing... so... something?
@realDonaldTrump @LifeZette This might be a bad time to say it, but you have a double chin in that photo. #fat #piss
Wee, the people.
@janhopis That, when combined with .@-ing, is worse than actual Trump.
@wefail Then there's this. https://t.co/H5MM6E03gK
@vornietom Not a movie, but Generation War captures the "this is normal, right?" mood of normal Germans pre and during.
@bsgorrie Yes. A working class theme park for people who are terrified of their bin man.
@BrianPilton All the best for 2017 Brian'
@WeahsCousin Which is to say, it was ace so well done.
@SimonNRicketts So deferential to the source material too. It's his own and yet it's what we know too.
@Bruciebabe Sensitive little Slush Puppy.
@Bruciebabe @H_L_Thompson @hrtbps I'm saying you're fat, Bruce. A fat, processed snowflake - a Slush Puppy, if you will.
@Bruciebabe @H_L_Thompson @hrtbps After you asked billions to do so, you wrong un.
@MichaelPDeacon ♬ Red & white & blue (passports), defo no black or brown. I can sing hard Brexit, sing hard Brexit, sing hard Brexit too.
@SimonNRicketts Oh, man. Hope you're able to wring out every last drop of joy.
@benjaminholgate @freddiedeboer @Glinner That's misguided, perhaps, but I wouldn't put it in the same category as blackface.
@benjaminholgate @freddiedeboer @Glinner I'd argue that a kid wearing it at a music festival does so cos it's beautiful and "spiritual".
@freddiedeboer @Glinner Great article, btw.
@freddiedeboer @Glinner It's about intent, no? Blackface is typically an insult, whereas an Indian headdress is worn in reverence.
@goddersbloom We should sell the Queen to the Saudis. It's the only way Godfrey, and I commend you for suggesting it.
@LouiseMensch This article says as much about you as Mair's bookcase said about him. You are unintentionally fascinating.
@gergilroy Remarkable that this is the case in a sport with video replays. A blind eye in HD.
@DanRebellato I have the best phrases. So, so good.
@DanRebellato The fraud thing won't matter to his followers (see tax evasion), but the theatre thing makes him look a bit pearl-clutchy.
@itvfootball When did Frank Lampard come out of international retirement?
@DaftLimmy It's almost as if he thinks widespread riots are needed in order to make America great again. https://t.co/um37lB85Vr
@kenearlys @saveciaranmurph Succeeded by Treefingers on Kid A.
@Dempster2000 He used to play a dad on Hollyoaks, but then came the "allegations".
I saw The Bootleg Paul Dickovs in Camber Sands a few years back. All the hits.
@Redknapp @Betsafe @AlanMcInally @OfficialPDickov "Official Paul Dickov".
If Corbyn and McDonnell were firemen, they'd refuse to tend to a burning orphanage because Amazon have a product called the "fire stick".
@miss4trump I pity you when the penny finally drops. It's going to be hard landing.

@miss4trump 2 days in; Clinton won't be locked up, Obamacare won't be repealed, Mexico won't pay be for the wall.
You were tricked.
@miss4trump Lobbyists will. Even if Trump wanted change (spoiler: he doesn't), he's not competent enough to make it happen.
@miss4trump It's adorable that you haven't worked out that you've been swindled. You'll get nothing he promised. It's already unraveling.
@miss4trump Dear turkey, enjoy Christmas.
@Nigel_Farage Fuck off you Toblerone-shrinking cunthouse.
@GMB @MeCookieMonster Why do you hate our war dead?
@hrtbps I'm in Latty, OH. I've amended the ballot papers to read "Don't mark an X beside the candidate you do not don't want to lose."
@giantpoppywatch I've increased the #respect by appx. 25% to atone for his lack of #respect to date.… https://t.co/Jht0ezEoNo
@giantpoppywatch @DVATW Why do you hate our soldiers, David?

@RogerHelmerMEP "We will fight them on the beaches. But not on our web-sites BECAUSE WE CAN'T BE BOTHERED."
Think on, Helmer.
@DaveWRichardson I'll be singing 'Canyonero' all night now.
@acjimbo There was a brief moment in time where racists and homophobes hide behind allusion. That's gone now, and the Mail reflects it.
@_PaulHayward @honigstein @DaveToffy The players will be doing it because the FA instructed them to do it.
